name: Scrappy - Traversal Game
description:
=========== Pitch ===========

In a desolate country, split into two groups, navigate different levels to complete difficult contracts in hostile locations using bad game technology that you will need to upgrade as you complete your missions.

=========== Concept ===========

Scrappy is a 3D platform game for one player.

The game consists of a series of missions with different objectives where the player must navigate more or less dangerous areas using special equipment.

During the game, he will unlock new equipment giving him access to new mechanics or improving already defined ones.

========== Player input ==========

ZQSD, WASD to move around (controller support included)

Move the mouse to change the orientation of the avatar (controller support included)

Space and "A" key (Xbox support) to jump

CTRL to unhook from a surface.
